name: Shaw's Nightmare II
description:
Shaw's Nightmare II is the continuation of the Shaw's Nightmare series.

  • 30 levels plus two secret levels
  • New monsters
  • New music
  • More sound effects
  • Lots of new graphics

Story

You are Shaw. You entered an experimental room at a science fair not knowing you will be trapped in another nightmare in a machine known as the Dream-catcher.
